channel.title: Staff only items help please
channel.description:
hey, ive been workin and workin at it but it just doesn't seem to work exactly how i want it. i made it so a few items are staff only but it doesnt delete the item if the players rights are 0. it always deletes the item when you bank. :( any help here? hard to say what im askin for.....
anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 01:04:18 AM[/size][hr]also, does anyone have a dl link for the gfx or animation list?
